abstract.t: This document describes the protocol design and architecture forEnhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol (EIGRP). EIGRP is a routingprotocol based on Distance Vector technology. The specific algorithmused is called DUAL, a Diffusing Update Algorithm as referance in"Loop-Free Routing using Diffusing Computations". The algorithm andprocedures were researched, developed, and simulated by SRIInternational.
